00036 #ifdef CMAKE_HAVE_STDINT_H
00037    #include <stdint.h>
00038 #else
00039 #ifdef CMAKE_HAVE_INTTYPES_H
00040    // Old system only have this
00041    #include <inttypes.h>   // For uint8_t uint16_t and uint32_t
00042 #else
00043 #ifndef WIN32
00044 #include <stdint.h>
00045 #endif
00046    #define TRUE 1
00047    #define FALSE 0
00048    #define ABS(a)    (((a) < 0) ? -(a) : (a))
00049 #endif
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__BORLANDC__)
00053    typedef  signed char         int8_t;
00054    typedef  signed short        int16_t;
00055    typedef  signed int          int32_t;
00056    typedef  unsigned char       uint8_t;
00057    typedef  unsigned short      uint16_t;
00058    typedef  unsigned int        uint32_t;
00059    #define UINT32_MAX    (4294967295U)
00060 #endif
